post.body: make me an offer I can't refuse !!! Cuz it's either ur mac pro or I upgrade to new iMac in Feb :-)
What new features? Will it make me randy? ;-)
@pandastick what "eva". Hot for words has been helping me build my vocab for years. She's..insightful....
I can relate! Having a few drinks to recover too. Was lucky though. Scored an insane parking spot.
yeah, I use the 2G one to test stuff and the 3G as the dependable main, if that makes any sense?
wow, Charlie Brown Christmas. That takes me back :-)
3G jailbroken, 2G Jailbroken & Unlocked.
it's at the Galeria Mall http://snipurl.com/8xh1a
can't wait for some NHL action on it new tv ;-)
Snoop is a pimp. Except for that silly show he had on E! - did that shit get canceled yet?

Made it to the Boat. Currently somewhere at sea, on the way to Grand Cayman. Will post location/pics reall soon. WiFi is $0.68. Insane.
May be inccomunicado for a bit. But prob not. As always, Twitter & Email are the best ways to Reach Out & Touch me. Happy Hollidays to all!
Getting ready to leave for the Port...I've bought too much shit. My suitcase looks morbidly fat.
